title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.3 - Physical requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.3 - Physical requirement

State Regulations
A wholesale liquor licensee, a wholesale wine licensee
and a winery licensee having the right to sell wine at retail may sell at
wholesale and retail on the same licensed premises, which said premises are not
required to be partitioned into separate wholesale and retail
sections. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
